user_instruction: 'Compose an email to Mr. Harrison Blackwood (hblackwood@investor.com) detailing our collaboration potential. You can check out my Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Draft Email Detailing Collaboration Opportunities with Mr. Blackwood

Hi Jane,

Could you please prepare a concise email to Mr. Harrison Blackwood (hblackwood@investor.com) outlining our potential avenues for collaboration with him? When drafting, feel free to reference the relevant materials in your Notion workspace to ensure all key points and data are included.

Once the draft is ready, please let me know so we can review and send it along promptly.

Thank you very much for your help.

Best regards,  
[Your Name]

final_output:
